p: Lamivudine is active against FIV in vitro [ 3, 20, 21, 23, 38, 41]. A combination of zidovudine and lamivudine had synergistic anti-FIV activities in cell cultures [ 41]. FIV mutants resistant to lamivudine and containing a point mutation in the RT gene were selected in vitro and showed cross resistance to zidovudine [ 23].
